thread.section_title: Room Mate Grace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fab hotel in a perfect lication
thread.title_full: Fab hotel in a perfect lication - Review of Room Mate Grace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Maddysw
title: Fab hotel in a perfect lication
text: Great location and a boutique type hotel. We had a triple room on 7th floor which suited us great and was quiet of a night. All staff were helpful and there if you needed to ask a question. Made us very welcome. The pool was ideal, especially for a 6 year old - he loved it! Would recommend and return.
